original_title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 1: Wagner
overview: The historic Toscanini television concerts with the NBC Symphony Orchestra. Broadcast #1 was of a concert on March 20, 1948, at NBC Studio 8H, featuring orchestral music from Wagner's operas. (Concerts #1 and #2 were released on "Vol. 1" in the DVD series.)
title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 1: Wagner
